original_text: The Ishmaelites took Joseph to Egypt and they sold him there as a slave. Potiphar bought Joseph from the Ishmaelites. He was one of Pharaoh's officers. He had authority over all the guards.
korean_text: 요셉이 이끌려 애굽에 내려가매 바로의 신하 친위대장 애굽 사람 보디발이 그를 그리로 데려간 이스마엘 사람의 손에서 요셉을 사니라

sentences.original_text: The Ishmaelites took Joseph to Egypt
and they sold him there as a slave
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그를 그곳에서 노예로 팔았습니다

sentences.original_text: Potiphar bought Joseph from the Ishmaelites
He was one of Pharaoh's officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바로의 고관 중 한 사람이었습니다

sentences.original_text: He had authority over all the guards
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 경비병들을 관할하는 권한을 가졌습니다
